backend/main.mo: Main canister logic handling user registration, labour profile CRUD, availability updates, and access control via authorization and storage mixins.
backend/migration.mo: Defines old/new state formats and a minimal migration that initializes empty user and labour maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend files used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based theme definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Central app router controlling screen navigation based on Internet Identity auth, role selection, and labour profile completeness.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages the authenticated/anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, and logout states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor calls with React Query hooks for user profiles, labour profiles, registration, updates, availability, and filtered labour search.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/areaOptions.ts: Exports fixed area selection options used in forms.
frontend/src/lib/skillOptions.ts: Exports preset labour skill options for filtering and profile editing.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Opens a WhatsApp chat window for a given phone number.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
UI for customers to filter labour by skill and area, display results, and contact workers via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/screens/LabourEditProfileSc: Form screen for labourers to load, edit, validate, and save their profile data.
frontend/src/screens/LabourHomeScreen.ts: Displays a labourer's profile with availability toggling, logout, and navigation to edit profile.
frontend/src/screens/LabourProfileSetupS: Form screen for labour users to submit name, phone, skill, area, wage, and availability, then save via updateLabourProfile.
frontend/src/screens/LabourRegistrationS: Empty/placeholder screen with no implemented content.
frontend/src/screens/LoginScreen.tsx: Login screen using Internet Identity with a button that triggers login and shows a loading state.
frontend/src/screens/SelectRoleScreen.ts: Lets users pick labour or customer role and registers it via backend, showing processing states.
frontend/src/screens/SplashScreen.tsx: Simple splash screen displaying the RozKaam title and tagline.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending colors, animations, containers, and plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project features, architecture notes, requirements, and current state.
